game.name: Northern Corridor
game.desc:
Description: You have traveled to the northern-most edge of the continent with your party. You have discovered the location of the enemy base, incapacitated the guards, and infiltrated the compound.
You have found a corridor that leads to the barracks, but you are blocked by a door containing a strange sequence of patterns and devices. This door is the last obstacle to reaching your ultimate goal... Controls: * Mouse - move the cursor * Left Click - activate a lever
